_header: My friend after I trow a week or two
_description: Thomas Hoccleve, Prologue to the prose Moralizing upon the tale of Gerelaus — four stanzas rhyme royal

CovAcc3251.First Lines:
MI frende affter I trowe a weke or twoThat this tale endid was home
                    to me…
CovAcc3251.Last Lines:
…And loo in this wise and maner it seithWhich to þat tale
                    is good be knytte in feith
CovAcc3251.Attributed Title:
Here endeth the Prolog And biginnyth the Amoralizinge of þe forsaide
                    tale (f. 56rb)
